sources.first_edition: December, 1769, Paris, Vénier (Op. 6), no. 1 of VI Quartetti per due violini, alto e violoncello dedicati a S. A. R. Du Luigi Infante di Spagna, da Luigi Boccherini, gravées par Mme la Veuve Leclair
later_editions: (c. 1785?), Paris, Boyer-Naderman (Op. 6), no. 1 of VI Quartetti
sources.modern_edition: 1953, Milan, Ricordi: Op. 6 no. 1 (pocket score; revised by Enrico Polo)

entries.notes: Op. 8 no. 2 of 1769 ('opera grande') in Boccherini's autograph catalogue. Arrangements: (A) Of the third movement, as part of a sonata for harpsichord (or pianoforte) and violin, by Thomas Billington, c. 1780(?). (B) Of the first and third movements, as a sonata for harpsichord (or pianoforte) and violin, by 'Mlle Le Jeune', c. 1785.

sources.first_edition: STRING QUARTERS (TWO VIOLINS, VIOLA AND 'CELLO) - First edition and later editions information continues from previous page
